page.description: Indiciates if the window is visible.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.ISVISIBLE() method returns .T. (TRUE) if a window is visible; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example shows how to determine if a window is visible.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ? ptr.IsVisible() = .T. ptr.hide() ? ptr.IsVisible() = .F.
